No matter how you look at it, but it becomes more and more obvious for everybody in Europe that Ukrainian supporters of "orange revolution" have split into two different camps, namely, Yuschenko's and Tymoshenko's camps. And I think it is necessary for Europe to support Yuschenko in his struggle against lady Yu. You see, Mrs. Tymoshenko is a typical oligarch, who rates her own interests and interests of her patron Berezovsky above any agreements, reached with EU partners. In his letter to Tymoshenko Berezovsky has declared expressly that reprivatization (which certainly infringes the interests of EU) should be brought to an end by all means. And it is clear that Tymoshenko will follow the instructions of her sponsor. She should pay revolutionary accounts. If so-called "gas princess" succeeds to continue in power, further criminalization will be the nearest future of Ukraine in general. And collapse is in store for its economy. Thus, our cooperation with Ukraine will be impossible at all. That's how things stand...!

post_info.post_title: No matter how you look at it, but it becomes more and more obvious for everybody ....

You know guys, since these hit and run one-non-sequitur-post-related-to-former-USSR topics only appear here in this particular forum, you think this might be some kind of a bot?

In this case though he is apparently reporting some spun facts but facts none the less. Mrs. Tymoshenko is an oligarch and is working to maintain the Oligarch system in the Ukraine. She is also very very wealthy, putting all other elected governments to shame with the possible exception of Italy's leader. 
 
 She is not going to be good for the Ukraine, not in the least bit.

Oh, the posts are a regular Vergasser, X parts real stuff, Y parts hot air.
 
 But the non-sequitur makes me wonder. A simple hit and runner would probably at least make a structured first post. This looks like a post from the middle of a conversation. The fact that it occured here really makes me wonder whether this might be some kind of an automated program, simply looking for forums and automatically posting.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  No matter how you look at it, but it becomes more and more obvious for everybody ....
